Question
========

You are doing a probability experiment in which you roll a die 145 times. Below you see a table showing different outcomes. Is it plausible that this is a *pure* die? \

  ------------------- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- Eyes 1 2 3 4 5 6 Number of times above 21 22 46 22 13 21 ------------------- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- ----

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Incorrect
* No: Correct
